channel.title: cat-Azumi on devotional.gq
channel.description: Recent content in cat-Azumi on devotional.gq

item.title: Prayer bpn11709 in Hausa
item.description: *A cikin Kitābil Akdas, Ubangiji yā cē : ‘’Mun umurci mutun da yin azumi da zāran yā kai shēkara gōma shā biyar. Wannan umurnin Allah nē, Ubangijinku da Ubangijin uwāyenku. Māsu balāguro, marassa lāfiya, da māta masu jūnā biyu, kō māsu bāda nōnō, ba a umurce su da yin azumi ba. Idan kuna azumi, kada ku shā ruwa, ko ku ci abinci daga fitōwar rānā, zuwa fāɗuwarta, kuma kada ku yarda nishāɗi ya hana ku sāmun wannan ni’ima da aka rubūta a cikin littāfi.

item.title: Prayer bpn11710 in Hausa
item.description: Yabo ya tabbata a garēka yā Ubangiji Allāna. Ina rōƙon ka, don darajar wannan bayyana, da ta maida duhu haske, kuma da garēta a ka gina masallacin jama’a, da garēta kuma aka sauko rubutaccen allo, a ka shinfida ɓoyayyan kundi, ina rōƙon ka sauko mana, ni da abōkan zamāna, abun da zai sā mu hira wajen samāniyar ɗaukakarka, kuma abun da zai tsarkakar da mu da dauɗar shakka da ta hana waɗanda ba su amince ba, shiga cikin zauren ɗayantakarka.
